attributes.action: David Freud should be removed from his position following harrowing comments against disabled people
attributes.additional_details:
For the sake of human decency, David Freud needs to be sacked for his disgusting views on disabled people not being worth the minimum wage.

How can he say this? True, some may be unable to work to due the nature of their disability, but the vast majority are able to contribute in an efficient and positive manner - but yet Freud would have them earning not even half the minimum wage just because they look or sound different.

This is disgusting - we are meant to look up to our politicians as bastions of society, yet politicians like Freud leave us unable to do so.

Pleas sign this and send a message to Cameron that Freud needs to be sacked.
